Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 16th overall pick, by Malibu in 1984...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 7/7/1987, off Jessie Beaudry (HAL)...
Injured on 7/19/1988 with a Bruised Finger, out for 4 days...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1990, hitting .423 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1990, hitting .417 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1990, hitting .394 with 6 HR, 20 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston (FBA) on 9/18/1990...
